titleStmt.title: A Memoriall intended to be delivered to the Lords State, Monday 10 March, stilo novo to the High and mighty Lords the States of Holland / by the forraign Anabaptist Churches, upon the apprehending and giving up Colonel Barkestead, Colonel Okey, and Mr. Miles Corbet to the English resident ; written originally in Dutch, and translated into English.

A Memoriall intended to be delivered to the Lords State, Monday 10 March, stilo novo to the High and mighty Lords the States of Holland / by the forraign Anabaptist Churches, upon the apprehending and giving up Colonel Barkestead, Colonel Okey, and Mr. Miles Corbet to the English resident ; written originally in Dutch, and translated into English.

notesStmt.note: Translation of unidentified work in Dutch.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
